name: ctab-page
description: A web extension giving you a customizable new tab screen
author: clanghout

scripts.start: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && node scripts/createSizeStyles.js && parcel src/index.html
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && node scripts/createSizeStyles.js && parcel build src/index.html
